original_text: But I will bring Israel's people back to their own land. They will grow their crops on Carmel and in Bashan. They will have plenty of food to eat on the hills of Ephraim and in Gilead. But I will bring Israel's people back to their own land. They will grow their crops on Carmel and in Bashan. They will have plenty of food to eat on the hills of Ephraim and in Gilead. But I will bring Israel's people back to their own land. They will grow their crops on Carmel and in Bashan. They will have plenty of food to eat on the hills of Ephraim and in Gilead. But I will bring Israel's people back to their own land.
korean_text: 이스라엘을 다시 그의 목장으로 돌아가게 하리니 그가 갈멜과 바산에서 양을 기를 것이며 그의 마음이 에브라임과 길르앗 산에서 만족하리라

sentences.original_text: But I will bring Israel's people back
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 이스라엘 백성을 돌아오게 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to their own land
They will grow their crops
on Carmel and in Bashan
They will have plenty of food to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 먹을 풍부한 음식을 가질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: on the hills of Ephraim and in Gilead
